Hi people!

Today, after another svn update, I tried to "re-install" heritr=
ix 3 by calling "mvn install". However, I noticed that there have been intr=
oduced some interactive tests :) not sure if it's on purpose or not, but th=
e test creates a job called "selftest-job" and pauses it. The only way I fo=
und to continue the build, was to open the job (https://localhost:8443/engi=
ne/job/selftest-job) on browser, log in by the password provided during the=
 creation of the job in the terminal, and unpause it. oh and this happens a=
bout 10-15 times! =3D)

Gordon, not sure if that's done on purpose, but cou=
ld you try to fix that, please? :)

Thanks in advance :)

cheers,
Ikrom (sa=
plo.com)
